  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomloose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:sodis.de:ASP-05500680.123</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>DE.FWU</catalog>
            <entry>ASP-05500680.123</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="de">Cold-water Corals</string>
            <string language="en">Cold Water Corals</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Coraux d'Eau Froide</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Corais Da Água Fria</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Corals Dell'Acqua Fredda</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοράλλια κρύου νερού</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Corales De la Agua Fría</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">In contrast to tropical stony corals, coldwater corals have no partner algae. They feed exclusively on plankton and thus grow at considerably slower rate. They are able, however, to build reefs at depths of several thousand meters in complete darkness and in icy temperatures. Deep sea fishing (bottom trawling) is the greatest threat to the slow growing coldwater corals.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Coral</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Reef</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Atoll</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Ecosystem</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <aggregationLevel>
            <source>aggregationLevelValues</source>
            <value>3</value>
          </aggregationLevel>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Contrairement aux coraux pierreux tropicaux, les 
coraux de coldwater n'ont aucune algue d'associé. Ils 
alimentent exclusivement sur le plancton et se développent ainsi à 
une cadence considérablement plus lente. Ils peuvent en mesure,
cependant, construire des récifs aux profondeurs de plusieurs mille 
mètres dans l'obscurité complète et dans les températures 
glaciales. La pêche maritime profonde (pêche au chalut 
inférieure) est la plus grande menace aux coraux de coldwater de 
croissance lente.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">No contraste aos corais stony tropicais, os 
corais do coldwater não têm nenhuma alga do sócio. Alimentam 
exclusivamente no plankton e crescem assim em uma taxa 
consideravelmente mais lenta. Podem , entretanto, construir 
recifes em profundidades de diverso mil medidores na escuridão 
completa e em temperaturas geladas. A pesca de mar profunda 
(trawling inferior) é a ameaça a mais grande aos corais do coldwater
do crescimento lento.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Contrariamente ai corals pietrosi tropicali, i 
corals del coldwater non hanno alghe del socio. Si alimentano 
esclusivamente su plancton e così si sviluppano al tasso 
considerevolmente più lento. Possono, tuttavia, costruire i 
reefs alle profondità di parecchio mille tester nella nerezza 
completa e nelle temperature ghiacciate. La pesca marittima 
profonda (pesca a strascico inferiore) è la minaccia più grande ai 
corals del coldwater crescere lento.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σε αντίθεση με τα τροπικά πετρώδη κοράλλια, 
coldwater τα κοράλλια δεν έχουν κανένα άλγος συνεργατών. 
Ταϊ'ζουν αποκλειστικά με το πλαγκτόν και αυξάνονται έτσι 
στο αρκετά πιό αργό ποσοστό. Είναι σε θέση, εντούτοις, να
χτίσουν τους σκοπέλους στα βάθη αρκετές χιλιάες μέτρων στο 
πλήρες σκοτάδι και στις παγωμένες θερμοκρασίες. Τα μεγάλα 
θαλάσσια βάθη που αλιεύουν (κατώτατο σημείο που γριπίζει) είναι
η μέγιστη απειλή στα κοράλλια αργής ανάπτυξης coldwater.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En contraste con los corales pedregosos 
tropicales, los corales del coldwater no tienen ninguna alga del 
socio. Alimentan exclusivamente en el plancton y crecen así en 
una tarifa considerablemente más lenta. Pueden, sin embargo, 
construir los filones en las profundidades de vario mil contadores en 
oscuridad completa y en temperaturas heladas. La pesca de mar 
profunda (el pescar con red barredera inferior) es la amenaza más 
grande a los corales del coldwater del crecimiento lento.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Corail</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Récif</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Atoll</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Écosystème</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Coral</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Recife</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Atoll</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ecosystem</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Coral</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Reef</string>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>

            <string language="x-mt-it">Ecosistema</string>
          </keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
